pr_title: Python-exp remove codegemodel mutation, allow mixed OneOf types

timeline.message: Revert additionalProperties import fix back in
Stops converting primitive models into object models, adds ComposedSchemas with mixed type
Stops converting primitive models into object models, adds ComposedSchemas with mixed type

timeline.bodyText: @spacether can you please provide a spec that results in an empty body parameter name? Is the body parameter a primitive type (e.g. integer)?
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
This happens when the body parameter is $refed and doesn't use x-codegen-request-body-name.
Our one higher invocation for that use case is here
This code path is already tested with our v3 sample document with these examples:

PUT /pet
POST /pet
POST /store/order
POST /user
POST /user/createWithArray
and others

If you look at the python sample files that were generated, in the *_api.py or *.md files one can see the body param name updates.
Because we already have a lot of coverage here in my opinion adding another endpoint here doesn't help us. What do you think?
replies.author: spacether

replies.bodyText: The name change code has been reverted s it's not the main focus of this PR
replies.author: spacether
